HYEHYEON MOON

Frontend Engineer · LINE NEXT hyehyeon.moon@linecorp.com

I have experienced large-scale web service development by leading the launch and operation of a web service with five million users at LINE NEXT. With three years of experience, I am proficient in React, TypeScript, JavaScript, and TanStack. I enjoy solving problems and prioritize user experience.
